publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-736 Mr Stewart Maxwell: Congratulations to Michelle McManus-That the Parliament congratulates Michelle McManus on her achievement in reaching the final of Pop Idol; wishes her every success for the final on Saturday 20 December 2003, and is confident that she will continue to represent all that is good in Scotland's young people today.
S2M-736 Congratulations to Michelle McManus (lodged on 16 December 2003) Michael Matheson*, Rob Gibson*, Margaret Mitchell*

S2M-736 Mr Stewart Maxwell: Congratulations to Michelle McManus-That the Parliament congratulates Michelle McManus on her achievement in reaching the final of Pop Idol; wishes her every success for the final on Saturday 20 December 2003, and is confident that she will continue to represent all that is good in Scotland's young people today. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Rob Gibson, Margaret Mitchell, Christine Grahame*, Karen Gillon*, Tricia Marwick*, Alex Neil*
S2M-736 Congratulations to Michelle McManus (lodged on 16 December 2003) Trish Godman*
S2M-736 Congratulations to Michelle McManus (lodged on 16 December 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
